segment.source: Design an instructional user interface (UI) that teaches users how to work with your Windows Store app.
segment.target: Design an instructional user interface (UI) that teaches users how to work with your Windows Store app.

segment.source: Guidelines for designing instructional UI
segment.target: Guidelines for designing instructional UI

segment.source: Guidelines for designing instructional UI
segment.target: Guidelines for designing instructional UI

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: Design an instructional user interface (UI) that teaches users how to work with your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.
segment.target: Design an instructional user interface (UI) that teaches users how to work with your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.

segment.source: Recommendations
segment.target: Recommendations

segment.source: Use instructional UI to introduce a new user to what your app can do.
segment.target: Use instructional UI to introduce a new user to what your app can do.

segment.source: Use for tips on new features or specific details about how your app has changed after an update.
segment.target: Use for tips on new features or specific details about how your app has changed after an update.

segment.source: Integrate instructional UI with specific tasks.
segment.target: Integrate instructional UI with specific tasks.

segment.source: Don't block interaction with the application UI.
segment.target: Don't block interaction with the application UI.

segment.source: Additional usage guidance
segment.target: Additional usage guidance

segment.source: In some circumstances, the best way to help users interact with your app is to teach them from within your app's UI.
segment.target: In some circumstances, the best way to help users interact with your app is to teach them from within your app's UI.

segment.source: We use the term instructional UI to refer to this type of guidance.
segment.target: We use the term instructional UI to refer to this type of guidance.

segment.source: A great example is using a UI element, like inline text or a flyout, to tell a user when they need to use a touch interaction to complete a task.
segment.target: A great example is using a UI element, like inline text or a flyout, to tell a user when they need to use a touch interaction to complete a task.

segment.source: Keep in mind that instructional UI is not a replacement for thoughtful design.
segment.target: Keep in mind that instructional UI is not a replacement for thoughtful design.

segment.source: If you use it too often or out of context, you can disrupt the flow of your app and diminish its effectiveness.
segment.target: If you use it too often or out of context, you can disrupt the flow of your app and diminish its effectiveness.

segment.source: Before adding instructional UI, explore other ways to introduce users to your app.
segment.target: Before adding instructional UI, explore other ways to introduce users to your app.

segment.source: See Related Topics for more info about layouts, navigation, and controls.
segment.target: See Related Topics for more info about layouts, navigation, and controls.

segment.source: Here are a few instances in which instructional UI can help your users learn:
segment.target: Here are a few instances in which instructional UI can help your users learn:

segment.source: Helping users discover touch interactions.
segment.target: Helping users discover touch interactions.

segment.source: The following screen shot shows instructional UI teaching a player how to use touch gestures in the game, Cut the Rope.
segment.target: The following screen shot shows instructional UI teaching a player how to use touch gestures in the game, Cut the Rope.

segment.source: screen shot from game showing instructional ui message, "slide acress to cut the rope"
segment.target: screen shot from game showing instructional ui message, "slide acress to cut the rope"

segment.source: Making a great first impression.
segment.target: Making a great first impression.

segment.source: Consider using instructional UI to introduce a new user to what your app can do.
segment.target: Consider using instructional UI to introduce a new user to what your app can do.

segment.source: For example, when Movie Moments launches for the first time, instructional UI prompts the user to begin creating movies.
segment.target: For example, when Movie Moments launches for the first time, instructional UI prompts the user to begin creating movies.

segment.source: launch screen for movie moments app
segment.target: launch screen for movie moments app

segment.source: Guiding users to take the next step in a complicated task.
segment.target: Guiding users to take the next step in a complicated task.

segment.source: In the Windows Mail app, a hint at the bottom of the Inbox directs users to Settings to access older messages.
segment.target: In the Windows Mail app, a hint at the bottom of the Inbox directs users to Settings to access older messages.

segment.source: cropped screen shot of windows mail app showing instructional ui message
segment.target: cropped screen shot of windows mail app showing instructional ui message

segment.source: When the user clicks the message, the app's Settings flyout appears on the right side of the screen, allowing the user to complete the task.
segment.target: When the user clicks the message, the app's Settings flyout appears on the right side of the screen, allowing the user to complete the task.

segment.source: These screen shots show the Mail app before and after a user clicks the instructional UI message.
segment.target: These screen shots show the Mail app before and after a user clicks the instructional UI message.

segment.source: Before
segment.target: Before

segment.source: After
segment.target: After

segment.source: screen shot of windows mail app
segment.target: screen shot of windows mail app

segment.source: screen shot of windows mail app with an extended settings flyout
segment.target: screen shot of windows mail app with an extended settings flyout

segment.source: Introducing UI changes.
segment.target: Introducing UI changes.

segment.source: If you made significant UI changes in the latest version of your app, users might like tips on new features or specific details about how your app has changed.
segment.target: If you made significant UI changes in the latest version of your app, users might like tips on new features or specific details about how your app has changed.

segment.source: Principles of instructional UI design
segment.target: Principles of instructional UI design

segment.source: Keep it simple.
segment.target: Keep it simple.

segment.source: Introduce one basic concept at a time and use images when possible.
segment.target: Introduce one basic concept at a time and use images when possible.

segment.source: Consider adding a Help section to your UWP app to address complex features.
segment.target: Consider adding a Help section to your UWP app to address complex features.

segment.source: Teach in context.
segment.target: Teach in context.

segment.source: Integrate instructional UI with the task it helps a user complete.
segment.target: Integrate instructional UI with the task it helps a user complete.

segment.source: A user is more likely to retain a concept when it's introduced when they need it most.
segment.target: A user is more likely to retain a concept when it's introduced when they need it most.

segment.source: Don't block interaction.
segment.target: Don't block interaction.

segment.source: Make sure users can still interact with your app while instructional UI is present.
segment.target: Make sure users can still interact with your app while instructional UI is present.

segment.source: Instructional UI should help users, not annoy them by getting in the way.
segment.target: Instructional UI should help users, not annoy them by getting in the way.

segment.source: Teach, then disappear.
segment.target: Teach, then disappear.

segment.source: Remove instructional UI as soon as it's no longer relevant or allow the user to dismiss it.
segment.target: Remove instructional UI as soon as it's no longer relevant or allow the user to dismiss it.

segment.source: Also, in most cases, users only need instructional UI displayed once.
segment.target: Also, in most cases, users only need instructional UI displayed once.

segment.source: Avoid repeatedly displaying the same instructional UI.
segment.target: Avoid repeatedly displaying the same instructional UI.

segment.source: Use sparingly.
segment.target: Use sparingly.

segment.source: Thoughtful design and a Help section can often teach users everything they need to know to enjoy your app.
segment.target: Thoughtful design and a Help section can often teach users everything they need to know to enjoy your app.

segment.source: Consider the breadth of design options before adding instructional UI to your app.
segment.target: Consider the breadth of design options before adding instructional UI to your app.

segment.target: Related articles
